try something ↔ out.translation[0].defin: to test something such as a method or a piece of equipment to see if it is effective or works properly
I’m trying out a new computer.
to practise a skill in order to improve it
She enjoyed trying her French out on Jean-Pierre.
try something ↔ out.translation[1].defin: a period of time spent trying a new method, tool, machine etc to see if it is useful
